content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in the heart of München to be a comfortable and convenient place to call home. How much are you willing to pay for this beautiful, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment sounds like it's in a great location, close to all the amenities I would need. As a student, I'm looking for a place that's not only functional but also affordable. What's the lowest price you're willing to offer for this apartment?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, as a landlord, I'm always looking to provide the best living experience for my tenants. However, I also need to ensure that I'm getting a fair price for my property. Would you be willing to pay 1,200 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 1,200 Euro per month is a significant amount for a student like me. While I appreciate the quality of your apartment, I'm looking for something more in line with my budget. Is there any flexibility in your price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that as a student, you have specific financial considerations. Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us. How about 1,100 Euro per month? This would be a great deal considering the location and the newness of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 1,100 Euro per month is more within my budget, but I'm still looking for something a bit more affordable. Is there any chance you could lower the price a bit more?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I want to provide you with a comfortable living space, but I must also cover my costs. How about we settle at 1,050 Euro per month? This is a very competitive price for the area, and you'll be getting a brand-new apartment in the city center. What is your final offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 1,050 Euro per month is getting closer to what I'm looking for. However, as a student, I'm trying to stretch my budget as far as possible. Would you be willing to go down to 950 Euro per month? This would be a very fair deal for both parties, considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, your offer is quite low for the location and the quality of the apartment. However, I'm willing to work with you. How about we meet in the middle at 1,000 Euro per month? This is a very reasonable price, and it reflects my desire to accommodate you as a tenant. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm grateful for your understanding and willingness to meet me halfway. 1,000 Euro per month is a price I can definitely consider. It's a fair deal for both parties, and I appreciate your effort to make this work for me as a student. Would it be possible to have a one-year lease with the option to renew?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Absolutely, Maryam. A one-year lease with the option to renew is perfectly acceptable. I'm glad to hear that we have reached an agreement at 1,000 Euro per month. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Your assistance has been greatly appreciated. I'm excited about the prospect of living in such a central location. Is there anything else I should know about the apartment or the neighborhood?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Maryam. I'm glad to have reached an agreement that suits both of us. The apartment is brand new, so you'll be one of the first tenants. The neighborhood is vibrant and safe, with a mix of residential and commercial properties. You'll find plenty of cafes, restaurants, and shops within walking distance. Additionally, the public transportation system is excellent, making it easy to explore other parts of the city. If you have any specific questions, feel free to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's great to hear, Mister Schmidt. The neighborhood sounds lively and convenient. I'm looking forward to moving in and exploring the area. Is there anything else I should be aware of before we finalize the lease?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Before we finalize the lease, I would like to ensure that you are aware of our strict no-smoking policy within the apartment. Additionally, we do not allow pets, as per our building's regulations. Other than that, we have a standard lease agreement that outlines all the terms and conditions of your tenancy. Once you've had a chance to review it, we can proceed with signing the lease and getting you set up in your new home. Is there anything else you need to know?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No smoking and no pets, I understand. I'm a non-smoker and do not have any pets, so these are not concerns for me. I'll be sure to review the lease agreement carefully before signing. Is there a move-in date we should aim for?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent, Maryam. Since the apartment is brand new, we are flexible with the move-in date. We can discuss and agree on a date that works best for you. Typically, we require a one-month security deposit and a first-month's rent payment in advance. Once we have agreed on a move-in date, I'll provide you with all the necessary paperwork and payment details. Is there anything else you need to know before we proceed?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mister Schmidt, I think we've covered everything. I'm ready to proceed with the lease once we've agreed on a move-in date. I'll make sure to review the lease agreement thoroughly and be ready with the required deposits and payments. It's been a pleasure negotiating with you, and I'm looking forward to a smooth move-in process. Thank you again for your time and assistance.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: It's been a pleasure working with you as well, Maryam. I'm glad we've reached an agreement that is satisfactory for both parties. Once you've confirmed the move-in date, we'll finalize the lease, and you'll be the proud new tenant of my apartment in the heart of München. If you have any further questions or need assistance with anything, please do not hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving into my new home and beginning my journey as a student in München. I'll get back to you soon with a proposed move-in date, and we can proceed with the lease. I appreciate your help and guidance throughout this process. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
